title: Scent the Room: Candles, Incense, & Room Sprays
description: Discover clean, natural, and handcrafted candles and aromatherapy sprays to scent space with lovely, good-for-you aromas.
cleaned_text: Traditional room sprays and candles are packed with artificial fragrances and other additives. Our options to scent your environment - home, office, or home office - include clean, simple vegan candles, and special aromatherapy sprays that not only make your space smell great but are good for the mind, body and spirit. 20 products
